display_help: Casts a Fire Shield on one of your allies and grants him damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Fire Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. You cannot stack multiple Fire Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Plasma Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
display_attacker_hit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal, Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
display_victim_hit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, and Cold damage.
